text: Sir Vere Cornwall Bird Sr., KNH (9 December 1910 â€“ 28 June 1999) was the first Prime Minister of Antigua and Barbuda. His son, Lester Bryant Bird, replaced him as Prime Minister. In 1994, he was made a Knight of the Order of the National Hero (KNH) by his native country Antigua and Barbuda. ==References== Category:1910 births Category:1999 deaths Category:Prime ministers of Antigua and Barbuda
title: Vere Bird
